description.en: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.ar: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.br: Pedra Mágica que acrescenta 20% de Ataque de Fogo. A arma deve ter o Elemento de Fogo.
description.cns: 提升武器20%火属性攻击力的魔法石。武器必须有火属性。
description.de: Magischer Stein, der den Feuerangriff deiner Waffe um 20% erhöht. Die Waffe muss das Feuerelement besitzen.
description.fi: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.fil: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.fr: Pierre Divine ajoutant à votre arme 20% d'attaque de Feu. Votre arme doit avoir un élément de Feu.
description.id: Magic Stone yang menambahkan 20% Serangan Api ke Senjatamu. Senjata harus memiliki Elemen Api.
description.it: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.jp: 火属性攻撃力を20％強化するマジックストーン。武器には「火」の属性が必要です。
description.kr: 무기의 불 속성 공격력을 20% 상승시키는 마법의 돌. 무기는 반드시 불 속성이 있어야 한다.
description.nl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.pl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.ru: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.sp: Piedra Mágica que otorga Daño de Fuego +20% a tu Arma. El Arma debe tener Elemento de Fuego.
description.sw: Magic Stone that adds 20% Fire Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Fire Element.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่เพิ่มFire Attack 20% ให้กับอาวุธของคุณ อาวุธต้องมีธาตุไฟ
description.tw: 為武器增加20%火屬性攻擊的魔法石。 武器須有火屬性。
description.vi: Magic Stone tăng thêm 20% Fire Attack cho Vũ khí của bạn. Vũ khí phải có yếu tố Lửa.
